# Preamble

These are lecture notes for a CADi course offered
at the Tecnologico de Monterrey, D.F. campus on
May 31-June 2, 2017. Material from these notes were drawn from

- Zumen and Mount, "Practical Data Science with R"  
- Grolemund and Wickham, "R for Data Science"  
- James, et al., "Introduction to Statistical Learning with Applications"  
- Silge and Robinson, "Text Mining with R"
